instructions: Open the Media Type pop-up menu, then choose the type of content you are searching for. You can use the Category menu to refine your search. Enter an app or book title or an ISBN, or paste a link from iTunes or the App Store, then tap Search. Select your app or book in the list, then enter the quantity. Universal apps that work on both iPhone and iPad are identified with the universal badge (+). Do one of the following: Choose Managed Distribution to distribute the apps. Note: You can also buy books in volume, but books obtained from the Books app, once assigned, become the property of the Managed Apple ID and cannot be reassigned. Choose redemption codes. Tap Review Order, make sure everything is correct, then tap Place Order. A mail message will be sent to this Managed Apple ID account, notifying you when the purchase is complete. You can complete your order with a credit card or Volume Purchase Programme credit (VPP credit). See Buy VPP credit for Apple School Manager .
